node.category: What is the way things are?
Should a visit to the doctor be mandatory before taking the 'morning-after pill'?
What is an argument against a mandatory visit to the doctor before taking the 'morning-after pill'?

node.surface: Of course it would be nice and simple if after a fun night out with a party acquaintance you could simply take the 'morning-after pill' and feel at ease.

node.category: Why does that argument not work?

node.surface: Perhaps a new life was already created that night.

node.category: Would the creation of new life cause a problem?

node.surface: I would kill it without further thought.
That's why a visit to the doctor and professional advice should remain mandatory.
